msbt.message: I feel like folks can tell way too much about me just by looking at my place. Stop giving away my secrets, furniture!

You know there are different kinds of sleep, right?I'm not a doctor, but there's the kind where your eyes are whizzing all around, and then the other kind <20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />The point is, you need a bed that works for all kinds, like my !

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Check out the , yo!I know we're out here roughing it on an island, but needs his HD, you know? <20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Sure, all I watch are shows about cooking, fighting, or cooking and fightingbut they're in HD!

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Sippin' on while listening to on my
<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />That's style, baby! You should try living the life too!

I guess technically I don't NEED a clock, since we're all on island time<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />But my is so stylish!<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Isn't that what's most important?<10_4 /> The answer is no, but just let me have this!
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Ah, so you noticed .<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Didn't think I had a green thumb, did you? Wanna guess what color my toes are?

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />I've got a whole routine with the .<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />See, I dip my left foot in first, because it's less sensitive. That way I can see if the water's OK. Then I begin the three-hour process of selecting just the right bathrobe for afterward

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />When it's time to sit down and do some writing, there's nothing better than my . <20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Wondering what it is I'm writing? I'll leave that to your imagination.

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Checking out my super cozy , eh?<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Yep, I had it custom engineered to match every curve of my body.In layman's terms, it's like a cloud hugging my butt!
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />You should hear the sweet sounds I can produce with . <20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />What, right now? UmmI already played today, so I can't again for a while.
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Yep, here's where the magic happens. Love cooking with my . <20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />From to , I can make anything, anytime.

Yes, even I exercisewith my trusty <20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" /> here.<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />"Just how does that work?" For years, folks have asked about my unconventional exercise regimen. I'm sure you'd like to know too, but I've got to withhold any details until the patent paperwork goes through.

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />OK, I know it's meant to go outside, but hear me out<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />I'm trying to make the INSIDE of my place feel like it's OUTSIDE. Why, you ask?<10_4 /> Umstill working on that.

Ah, I see you've taken a shine to my .I've always believed that the right lighting makes all the difference when it comes to home decor. Can you imagine what life was like before electricity? No lamps. No chandeliers. No sconces! It must've been so gloomy. Everyone sitting in the dark, reading by the glow of their smartphones.
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Some folks say having means you must love to look at yourself. <20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />And what's wrong with that?

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />You know, you could say that my is my prized possession. But then you would be wrong.<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />In reality, it's the fierce protector of my actual prized possession my impeccably honed wardrobe.
